content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Furnace at position (x)
Consists of:
- Furnace (position x)

### Coal extraction setup at position (x)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill (position x1) and a furnace (position y1)

### Iron plate factory at position (x)
Consists of:
- Assembling machine (position z1) and inserter (position a) that puts into assembling machine
- Beltgroup (position b) that connects the furnace at position y1 to assembling machine at position z1

### Iron gear wheel crafting setup
Consists of:
- Assembling machine (position z2) and inserter (position a2) that puts into assembling machine
- Beltgroup (position b2) that connects the iron plate factory to the assembling machine at position z2

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors related to crafting due to insufficient ingredients
- Ensure you have enough required ingredients in your inventory before attempting to craft items. For example, crafting iron gear wheels requires iron plates, which must be available.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing. Check for existing entities in the target position.

### Errors related to inspecting furnace inventory
- Always check the inventory of the furnace after performing extraction to ensure the expected items are present.
